name: A Measure of Valor
description: Tales have spread across the galaxy that the crew of the USS Phoenix was killed, save for one brave soul who somehow managed to fight off the intruders. Starfleet needs you to find the Phoenix and solve the mystery of its now legendary hero.
rules:
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Federation, Bajoran, or Klingon Faction Missions in one Phase, and Ship Battles in another Phase.
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- Unique Ship Battles and Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Li Nalas, Lavelle, Mudd, Mavericks, or crew with the matching battle trait will provide a bonus to Ship Battles and Faction Missions.
-- Using the U.S.S Phoenix, Generational NX-01, or the Miranda Class will provide a hull bonus in Skirmish Battles.
-- Every Ship Battle or Faction Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Li Nalas, Lavelle, Mudd or Mavericks
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: O'Brien
featured_crew.flavor: Chief O'Brien is strongly determined to beat Doctor Bashir at racquetball.

action.name: I Can Play Any Style You Like

featured_crew.name: Sam
featured_crew.flavor: Lavelle was career-oriented and driven and most wanted a promotion

action.name: Aye, Aye, Sir!

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: O'Brien
rewards.flavor: Chief O'Brien is strongly determined to beat Doctor Bashir at racquetball.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

goals.flavor: Learn of the Phoenix's valor with the Federation.
Help the Bajorans learn of the Phoenix's history.
Show the Phoenix's honor to the Klingon Empire.
